context: A number of researchers (David Rodda, Jacob Vigdor, and Janna Matlack), argue that <a0_0><b5_0>a shortage of <a0_1><a0_2>affordable housing<b5_0/><a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/> – at least in the US – is caused in part by income inequality.
